BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.7.7.1046 USER-REQ: Create 3D LandingImages with 3D Image Generator for Airports UPDATE: Internal database for airports and runway updated to Sim 1.15.8.0 (AIRAC incl. Hotfix) 103 changes on airports, 28 renamed runways, 2 other changes in runways UPDATE: Localization has been added for Japanese and Dutch UPDATE: Small things on the GUI UPDATE: Removed compatibility code to v0.5 (TTS)
--- 0.7.6.1027 FEATURE: Selecting the Textcolors for Activity Widget FEATURE: Select the Language to use for WPNames and/or TTS, if you don*t want to use translated entries UPDATE: Another try to avoid spawning in other aircrafts when parking spots are used UPDATE: new window for update info UPDATE: Workaround for bing maps issue with antimeridian crossings
